autorole.no_args: {wrong} No args were provided, do you want bot or user option ?
autorole.bot: {check} Autorole for bots is the role : {botrole} !
autorole.user: {check} Autorole for users is the role : {userrole} !
autorole.description: Define an automatic role for new users and bots.

ban.waiting: {typing} {author} Do you really want to ban {user} ?
ban.no_user: {wrong} Sorry, i didn't found this user, are you sure you provided a mention, id or name ?
ban.no_perm: {wrong} Sorry, i can't ban {usertag} because i lack the `BAN_MEMBERS` permission or the user's role is higher than me.
ban.dm: You were banned from the guild : **{server}** for the reason: **{reason}**.

ban_channel.no_channel: {wrong} Sorry, I didn't found the channel, are you sure you provided a mention, id or name ?
ban_channel.default_params: {check} Default parameter was created in the channel : {channel} !
ban_channel.description: Define a ban channel for banned users.

ban_msg.no_message:
{wrong} No message were provided, there is some option : `{server}` for the name of the guild.
`{user}` for the banned user.
`{membercount}` for the number of members in the guild.
ban_msg.description: Define an ban message when a user is banned from the guild.
